result.arabic_text: مِثۡلَ دَأۡبِ قَوۡمِ نُوحٖ وَعَادٖ وَثَمُودَ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡۚ وَمَا ٱللَّهُ يُرِيدُ ظُلۡمٗا لِّلۡعِبَادِ
result.translation: 31.Nuuc maraay, Qaadaay, Samuuduuy, keenik lakal yemeete maray koroosannuu kee ambiyá dirabboysaanam qaadah luk suget tekke digaaláh inna-le digaalá siinit takkeemik siinih meesita. kaadu Yalli naqoosah duhni mafaxaay, dambi maleh ken ma-digaalá.
